description: Erection of rear  dormer roof extensions to facilitate loft conversion. New front porch with associated changes to fenestrationPorch extension and loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The facing materials used in the development to which this permission relates shall match those of the existing building(s) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to the commencement of any works above ground, a Fire Safety Strategy shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The Fire Safety Strategy shall demonstrate how the development will achieve the highest standards of fire safety and shall include the following details: 1) suitably positioned outside space for fire appliances/ an evacuation assembly point; 2) Appropriate fire alarm systems; 3) Passive and active fire safety measures; 4) appropriate construction details to minimise the risk of fire spread; 5) provision of suitable and convenient means of escape/ an evacuation strategy; 6) provision of suitable access and equipment for firefighting which is appropriate for the size and use of the development. The Fire Strategy shall include a statement of competence. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved Strategy and thereafter maintained. Reason: In the interests of fire safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021. This is required prior to commencement as it goes to the heart of the scheme design

The development must be carried out in accordance with the provisions of the Tree Survey & Tree Protection Plan prepared by Rootcause Arboriculture dated 15th May 2022 unless otherwise approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To ensure that trees that are important to the character of the area or covered by TPOs are not adversely affected in accordance with Policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.

The rear roof extension (Dormer Window) hereby approved, shall be constructed so that the distance from the eaves of the building to the edge of the Dormer Window shall be no less that 45 cm, as measured along the roof slope from the edge ofthe enlargement to the outer edge of the eaves.Please see Page 36 of Permitted development rights for householders Technical Guidance 2019 for guidance.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt. The submitted drawings are not clear, the assessment of the proposal has been based on the Proposed Side Elevation B on Drawing Title Existing and Proposed Elevations - 02
